% Pandoc LaTeX template with unicode-math and STIX Two fonts
% Save as docs/templates/pandoc_ieee_math.tex and use with pandoc -H
\PassOptionsToPackage{unicode}{hyperref}
\PassOptionsToPackage{hyphens}{url}
\documentclass[11pt]{article}

% Page and font setup
\usepackage[margin=1in]{geometry}
\usepackage{fontspec}
\usepackage{unicode-math}
\setmainfont{STIX Two Text}
\setmathfont{STIX Two Math}

% Links black for camera-ready
\usepackage[colorlinks=true,linkcolor=black,citecolor=black,urlcolor=black]{hyperref}

% Pandoc tight list support
\providecommand{\tightlist}{%
  \setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}\setlength{\parskip}{0pt}}

% Inject Pandoc highlighting macros (defines \NormalTok, \StringTok, etc.)
$if(highlighting-macros)$
$highlighting-macros$
$endif$

% Graphics and tables
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{booktabs}
\usepackage{siunitx}

% Define pandocbounded macro used by newer Pandoc for bounded content
\providecommand{\pandocbounded}[1]{#1}

% Code block support for Pandoc (Shaded/Highlighting)
\usepackage{xcolor}
\usepackage{fancyvrb}
\usepackage{framed}
\makeatletter
\@ifundefined{Shaded}{%
  \definecolor{shadecolor}{RGB}{248,248,248}%
  \newenvironment{Shaded}{\begin{snugshade}}{\end{snugshade}}%
}{}
\makeatother
\providecommand{\VerbBar}{|}
\providecommand{\VERB}{\Verb}
\DefineVerbatimEnvironment{Highlighting}{Verbatim}{commandchars=\\\{\}}

% Tighter spacing knobs (use carefully)
\setlength{\textfloatsep}{10pt}
\setlength{\floatsep}{8pt}
\setlength{\intextsep}{10pt}

$if(title)$
\title{$title$}
$endif$

$if(author)$
\author{$for(author)$$author$$sep$ \\$endfor$}
$endif$

$if(date)$
\date{$date$}
$else$
\date{}
$endif$

\begin{document}
\maketitle

$body$

\end{document}
